basics.name: Harshvardhan Joshi
basics.label: Mobile App Developer & Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Crafting exceptional mobile and web experiences with Flutter, NextJs, and React. Over 8+ years of experience delivering high-quality, performant apps on multiple platforms. Passionate about continuous learning and open source contributions.
basics.headline: Full Stack Developer | Flutter Expert | Active Open Source Contributor

apps.name: Exch - Currency Converter
apps.description: A modern currency converter providing real-time exchange rates for 150+ currencies, featuring a clean and minimalist interface with instant calculation updates and offline mode support. The web version is built with NextJs and the mobile version (currently in beta) is built with Flutter.

apps.notes: Mobile version built with Flutter is in beta testing stage.

experience.summary: Working on my own app, Exch - Currency Converter, as well as enhancing the Fortime Timer app and collaborating on various projects for Imagined Studios as a freelance full-stack developer.
Working on the Solo for Creators Flutter app and revamping the internal recruitment job board using NextJs. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions.

Led the 'GO Web & Mobile App' project from concept to deployment with a team of 5 full-stack developers. Integrated new features across sub-projects such as the Web App, Mobile App, Onboarding, Digital KYC, and more. Achievements include successful project delivery, team leadership, and driving technical direction with Flutter, React, and NodeJS.

Led all Flutter client projects from concept to deployment, creating scalable Flutter apps and toolkits including QuickStart Flutter Login and E-commerce kits, among others. Key achievements include successful app deployments, enhanced user experience, and mentoring junior developers.

Led the rebranding of the Investar India Mobile App by migrating from a native Android codebase to Flutter, ensuring full feature parity and iOS support. Achievements include successful app rebranding, significant feature enhancements, and process innovations such as developing creative solutions for dynamic widget rendering in Flutter.
